Class SpinOrbitTorque.OrbitalHallMaterial

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.physics.spintronics.SpinOrbitTorque.OrbitalHallMaterial
Enclosing class:
SpinOrbitTorque
public static class SpinOrbitTorque.OrbitalHallMaterial extends Object
Materials exhibiting Orbital Hall Effect (OHE). OHE generates orbital angular momentum current without requiring heavy elements.
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
See Also:
  • OHE in light metals, Nature Materials 2022
